There are objections against church government, objections and questions in regard to many things. Satan is sowing the seed of doubt and questioning, murmuring and fault-finding. He chooses the darkness. His own hand has closed the door of knowledge. He has refused to comply with God's will, If he rejects the process 
                                                                           500
through which the Lord works he will see no light, The doubts and cavils are all the time setting his soul in stubborn rejection. God says, "I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness." (John 8:12)
